name: Inema Arts Center
description: Contemporary art gallery and studio space showcasing Rwandan artists

name: Nyungwe Forest National Park
description: One of the oldest rainforests in Africa with chimpanzee tracking and canopy walk

name: Volcanoes National Park
description: Home to mountain gorillas in the Virunga Mountains

name: Akagera National Park
description: Rwanda's largest protected wetland and savanna ecosystem

name: Iby'Iwacu Cultural Village
description: Living cultural village near Volcanoes NP offering traditional experiences

name: Kimironko Market
description: Kigali's largest market for crafts, textiles, and local produce

name: Rwesero Art Museum
description: Art museum housed in the former King Mutara III Rudahigwa's palace

name: Genocide Archive of Rwanda
description: Digital archive preserving testimonies and documentation of the genocide

name: Lake Kivu
description: One of Africa's Great Lakes with beaches and cultural fishing traditions

name: Gishwati-Mukura National Park
description: Recently established park protecting montane forest ecosystems
